mapper.insert: insert into tbl_lecture_note(lct_note_title, lct_desc, member_id) values (#{lecTitle},#{lecContents},#{memberId});
mapper.select: select lct_note_id, lct_note_title, lct_desc, lct_note_date, lct_progress, member_id, license_code from tbl_lecture_note where member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.insert: insert into ref_tbl_lecture_youtube(lct_note_id, member_id, video_id) values (#{lectureNoteId}), (#{memberId}), (#{videoId});
mapper.update: update tbl_lecture_note set license_code = #{licenseCode} where lct_note_id = #{lectureNoteId};
